hero_desc: End‑to‑end design and additive manufacturing. FDM & resin, prototypes, short runs and functional parts.
badges: PLA · PETG · ABS · ASA · NYLON · TPU
step1_desc: Find a model in repositories or tell us your idea to model from scratch.
step2_desc: Use the online estimator to upload .stl/.obj/.zip and tune params.
step3_desc: Pay with Stripe or request a custom quote.
step4_desc: Shipping across Spain. Local pickup optional.
apps_list: Prototyping; Architecture; Education; Merchandising; Medicine; Automotive; Art
pricing_desc: Direct purchase with Stripe. For custom parts, use the estimator.
contact_desc: Tell me about your project and I’ll send a proposal.
ai_privacy: Private. Your data is not published. LLM.
